changes: Added `/about`, `/wonderland` cover images now upload to Discord CDN and use it to load instead of loading from HoYo servers. Introduce `/changelogs` command to view changelogs.
fix: Previous GUID being retained when running `/wonderland`
fix: Prevented /wonderland command from failing when embed descriptions exceed Discord limits
improve: Truncate long level descriptions for better mobile readability
improve: Allow commands to be used in Direct Messages (DMs)
internal: Added daily rotating log files for improved debugging and stability
